lines.text: [first lines]
Officer, can you tell me the way to Three Rivers?
About two miles to the first main intersection, then turn left. It's about sixty miles.
Thanks, what town is this?
Suddenly.
Suddenly what?
No no, that's the name.

[laughs]
That's a funny name for a town.
Uh huh, hangover from the old days; that's the way things used to happen here, suddenly.
I see.
Road agents, gamblers, gunfighters.
Well, I take it things have changed.
Uh huh. Things happen so slow now, the town council is figuring to change the name to Gradually.

[laughs]
Thanks, officer.
Pleasure, come back.
The thing about killing you or her or him is that I wouldn't be getting paid for it and I don't like giving anything away for free.
I'm not actor, bustin' my leg on a stage so I can yell 'down with the tyrants'. If Booth wasn't such a ham he might've made it.
It didn't stop. It didn't stop!
Don't you have any feelings?
No, they were taken outta me by experts.
You stink
You've got guts, kid.
He's only 8.
A LOT of guts.
Don't play God just because you have a gun.
You know when you have a gun you ARE in a way sort of a god. If you had the gun then you would be the god.
Tonight at five o'clock I kill the President. One second after five there's a new President. What changes? Nothing!
Your guts are showing all over the place, brave boy.
I hate awards.
You want an ice cream soda?
That sounds good, but that's not what I'm thinking about.
You want to go to a movie?
There's just a war picture showing and mom doesn't let me see war pictures because of how daddy died.
[stopping at a toystore window]
You want that baseball bat?
No but you're getting warmer.
[points to a cap pistol]
You know I read about an experiment, tried to keep a kid away from germs, all scientifical. First time he went out in the rough he caught cold and died of pnuemonia.
What's that got to do with Pidge?
It has everything to do with Pidge, the kid hadn't been exposed to it, he had no immunity.
He has to learn that guns aren't always bad, it just depends on who uses them.
Tod carries a gun, doesn't he?
Yes he does.
You're a very careful man.
That's right.
Planned on everything, huh?
Sheriff, the first man they shoot to the moon in a rocket will take pains, too. Of course, that's never been done before. Neither has this.
When a house is on fire everybody must come and help put it out... because the next time it just might be your house.
You don't like me, do you?
You're an animal.
I don't like you either.
Animals kill each other to live. That's what you're doing.
medium rare or well done?
What the Hades is going on in this burg? Did some galoot make a uranium strike?
[last lines]

[stops car to ask for directions]
Say, officer.
Yeah?
Could you tell me the way to Three Rivers?
Ah, you go down to the first intersection, you turn left, it's about sixty miles.
Thanks. What town in this?
Suddenly.
Suddenly what?
No, that's the name.
That's a funny name for a town.
[begins to drive away]
Oh, I don't know. I don't know about that.
